meta.title: Enabling FrodoKEM on Embedded Devices
meta.abstract:
FrodoKEM is a lattice-based Key Encapsulation Mechanism (KEM) based on unstructured lattices. This is a text abstract with some math $x \mapsto \frac{1}{2}^x \cdot \sqrt{x}$. It also contains display math: \[ 3.7 \cdot \sum_{i=0}^n x^i \] and a itemize

  • first
  • second

Now enumerate:

  1. 1
  2. 2
